triggers.code:
-- 23.03.2022 Galya
IF :SUPP_ITEMS.SI_BONUS_SUB_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL THEN
BEGIN
  SELECT code_desc
  INTO :SUPP_ITEMS.SUB_BONUS_NAME
  FROM codes
  WHERE tab_no = 1553
    AND code = :SUPP_ITEMS.SI_BONUS_SUB_CATEGORY;
EXCEPTION
  WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
  errors2(10735,'e','��� �� ������� ������ �� ����');
END;   
END IF;
-- 23.03.2022 Galya

triggers.name: POST-DELETE
triggers.code:
-- Michal Porian 01/2014 -- Copied from pre-delete
begin
update items
    set i_main_supp =
        (select  max(s.supplier_no)
           from supp_items s
          where s.item_no      = :supp_items.item_no
            and s.supplier_no != :a1.supp_no
            and s.date_update =
                (select max(s1.date_update)
                   from supp_items s1
                  where s1.item_no      = s.item_no
                    and s1.supplier_no != :a1.supp_no))
where item_no     = :supp_items.item_no
   and i_main_supp = :a1.supp_no
   and not exists (select '�'
                      from supp_items
                     where item_no      = :supp_items.item_no
                       and supplier_no = :a1.supp_no);
exception when no_data_found then null;
end;
-- Update the main supplier to null when the last supplier is
-- beind deleted.
begin
update items
    set i_main_supp = ''
  where item_no = :supp_items.item_no
    and not exists (select '�'
                      from supp_items
                     where item_no      = :supp_items.item_no  );
exception when no_data_found then null;
end;
